name: Grant Industries - BCR Vegan Lipid Complex
description: Grant Industries offers BCR Vegan Lipid Complex, a specified combination of materials designed to encourage moisturization, barrier repair, and skin soothing. This vegan-friendly formulation provides comprehensive barrier support without animal-derived ingredients, making it ideal for clean beauty and cruelty-free product lines.

contact.address: 125 Terhune Street, Elmwood Park, NJ 07407, USA

notes: Specialty cosmetic ingredient manufacturer with innovative personal care solutions. BCR Vegan Lipid Complex is designed for moisturization, barrier repair, and skin soothing. Vegan-certified and ideal for clean beauty formulations.
